snippet: The Treasury Department said Babak Morteza Zanjani had conspired with a bank and a network of front companies to move money for Iran.
abstract: United States blacklists Iranian business executive Babak Morteza Zanjani and several businesses in what it describes as his multibillion-dollar money laundering network; accuses businesses of selling oil for Iran in violation of Western economic sanctions imposed over Iran’s disputed nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said Babak Morteza Zanjani had conspired with a bank and a network of front companies to move money for Iran.

headline.main: U.S. Blacklists an Iranian and His Businesses Over Violation of Sanctions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Blacklists an Iranian and Businesses Over Violation of Sanctions
